FuncDef:
The clock 2msync priority command configures a priority for a clock source.
The undo clock 2msync priority command deletes the priority for a clock source.
The default priority of a clock source is 0. That is, this clock source does not participate in clock source selection.

ParaDef.Info:
Priority of a line clock source.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 255. A smaller value indicates a higher priority.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To allow external input clock signals to participate in 2M PLL clock source selection, run the clock priority command.
The default priority of a line clock source is 0. In this case, the line clock source does not participate in clock source selection.
